sentences.en: An output device in a network, such as a monitor, printer or image setter, etc.
sentences.cn: 在网络内的输出装置.例如显示器, 印字机或图文影排机等.

sentences.en: Examples are : laser printer , plotter, image setter, etc.
sentences.cn: 例如 激光印字机, 绘图机, 图文影排机.

sentences.en: He was entitled a & quot ; Young Pace - Setter & quot; due to his excellent performance.
sentences.cn: 他因成绩出色被评为“青年突击手”.

sentences.en: He was setter - on to treason.
Jim stepped inside the door, as immovable as a setter at the scent of quail.
sentences.cn: 吉莫迈步进了门, 仿佛一条猎犬嗅到了鹌鹑的气味,一动不动了.

sentences.en: Jim stopped inside the door, as immovable as a setter at the scent of quail.
sentences.cn: 吉姆站在屋里的门口边, 纹丝不动地好像猎犬嗅到了鹌鹑的气味似的.

sentences.en: Line feed : Advancement of paper in an image setter or printer by one line.
sentences.cn: 每行进给量: 图文影排机或印字机的纸张向前移动一行的数量.

sentences.en: She is considered a pace - setter in The corporation.
sentences.cn: 她被看成全公司的标兵.

sentences.en: Since then, the Irish Setter in large areas of Europe as a whole to pop up.
sentences.cn: 在那之后, 爱尔兰雪达犬在整个欧洲大面积地流行起来.

sentences.en: The Gordon Setter has plenty of bone substance.
sentences.cn: 哥顿塞特犬的骨量非常充足.

sentences.en: The price of a setter within is the most expensive.
sentences.cn: 边滚筒式照排机的代价是最不贱的.

sentences.en: The structure of the outer drum - type setter is ideally suited to plate.
sentences.cn: 边滚筒式照排机的布局出格得当间接制版机.

sentences.en: Then in 1957 he was named as a national pace - setter.
sentences.cn: 后来在1957年,他又被评为全国的"标兵".

sentences.en: This option setter specifies the member hook the container must use.
sentences.cn: 这个选项设置器指定容器必须使用的成员钩子.

words.tran_cn: [数] 集合；一套；布景；[机] 装置；vt. 树立；点燃；点缀；；vi. （日，月）落沉；凝固；结果；adj. 固定的；规定的；固执的
环境；安装；布置；[天] 沉落
放置；沉没；使…处于某位置（set的ing形式）
[机]调节器；作曲者；排字工人；安装员，从事安装的人

trans.tran_cn: 安放者，安装员，作曲者，排字者，塞特种猎狗
